title: chatgpt-webapp
text: You may need two things below, for Chinese people I’ll list the tutorial at the end: 1. An openAI API Key, maybe a VPN to apply one. And set a environment variable named OPENAI_API_KEY to store it. 2. A credit card not applied in China sovereign area if big usage is expected.

title: chatgpt-webapp
text:
Install
pip install openai, gradio, fire
pip install chatgpt_webapp

title: chatgpt-webapp
text:
How to use
chatGPT_webapp.py --help # show usage

chatGPT_Webapp.py \
--IP [your server IP, e.g 10.10.10.199] \
--Port 5010[default] \
--model_engine 'gpt-3.5-turbo'[default]

text:
for Chinese user, 中国用户指引
注册openAI账号教程链接
申请openAI API Key:
>登陆账号后点击右上角personal个人头像 -> View API keys -> create new secret key,
>复制key创建一个环境变量， export OPENAI_API_KEY=$your_key
申请虚拟信用卡: https://depay.depay.one
